subject: Diving (Sports Event)
Chinese-Americans
lead_paragraph: Thomas Finchum of the United States beat two Chinese divers to win the men’s 10-meter platform final at the USA Diving Grand Prix in Fort Lauderdale, Fla.
snippet: Thomas Finchum of the United States beat two Chinese divers to win the men’s 10-meter platform final at the USA Diving Grand Prix in Fort Lauderdale, Fla.
